passiveList.name: Fair Presents
passiveList.desc:
When applying positive effects to other allies with Skill effects or Coin effects, randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking.
Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect to 1 random enemy. (Activates 5 times per Turn. Can be applied up to 5 times per enemy. For abnormalities, applied to a random Part.)

[BeforeAttack] This unit loses 10% HP
